text: Lip    If cancer is in the lip, treatment may include the following:         -  Surgery and external radiation therapy with or without internal radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy before or after surgery.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy and radiation therapy.     - A clinical trial of hyperfractionated radiation therapy.          Front of the tongue    If cancer is in the front of the tongue, treatment may include the following:         -  External radiation therapy
